context.p: To undo an operation, do the following:

step.cmd: Call up the list of recent operations.

info.p: To call up the list of recent operations, choose Edit Undo .

stepresult.p: The list of recent operations will appear. The most recent operations come first on the list.

fig.title: The list of recent operations you can undo.

info.p: On the list, click the operation to undo.
When you undo an operation, you also undo all the operations above it on the list.

note.p:
You can also undo the very last operation one of these ways:
Click the Undo button on the toolbar.
Press Ctrl-Z.
